description:
Have you been looking for quick and easy to follow instructions on how to play the guitar? well look no further...

Through this course you will learn to play beginner guitar or get refreshed on chords that you have learned but have not played for awhile. After you are finished with this course you will be able to play a number of chords and also be able to play a song from beginning to end.

Make sure and download all the material before you start the course, I encourage you to print out your practice sheet if you are able. Included are a practice sheet, chord charts, and also the song sheet that we will be going over.

I encourage you to go through this course slowly and rewind if need be, the course should take you no longer then an hour to finish, but please take breaks in between lessons to practice.

Take this course because you want to learn guitar at your own pace, be patient with yourself and have fun!

So get your guitar, notepad, laptop, desktop, or mobile device and lets learn guitar!!
title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
